title: Quantum-Disruptive RSA (QD-RSA): v1.1 Release
description:
QD-RSA v1.1 introduces symbolic, entropy-hardened enhancements to classical RSA to protect against quantum threats. This initial release invites public cryptanalysis and deployment evaluation.

🔐 Φₛ(x): Session-specific irrational masking
🔐 Ξₛ(x): Entropy-shifted non-convex trap function
🔐 𝓘ₛ*(x): Symbolic hash wrapped in SHA3-256

Includes: Python, C, and C# reference implementations, version declaration, cryptanalysis brief, and test suite.

This release is certified backdoor-free: no embedded recovery key, trapdoor, or government-accessible override mechanism.
